'''Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.4]].

==Event Details==
{{Domain Infobox
|title        = Hilinigmatic Duel
|displaytitle = no
|mapicon      = Icon Peculiar Wonderland.svg
|image        = Domain Hilinigmatic Duel.png
|type         = Event
|event        = Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain
|description  = A Domain entrance that suddenly appeared in Dadaupa Gorge, and which seems to have something to do with the unusual activities of the hilichurl tribes. The Domain's gate is linked to a wondrous space similar to that of Divine Ingenuity, and the foes within have access to all manner of strange, dazzling tricks...
|region       = Mondstadt
|area         = Galesong Hill
|subarea      = Dadaupa Gorge
|requiredAR   = 20
}}
===Duration===
* 2024/02/29 10:00:00 – 2024/03/11 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* Adventure Rank 20 or above
* Complete Archon Quest Prologue: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"

===Summary===
* This event is divided into two types of gameplay: "Exploratory Journey" and "Hilinigmatic Duel."
* After the event begins, new challenges will unlock with time. Complete Exploratory Journeys to unlock the subsequent Hilinigmatic Duels.
* In the "Exploratory Journey" gameplay, Travelers must use the Eye of Upano and plan the route wisely to infiltrate the hilichurl camps and conduct secret investigations.
* In the "Hilinigmatic Duel" gameplay, Travelers can challenge formidable opponents within the Domain. Take advantage of the opponents' attacks and make use of stage effects to complete the challenge faster.
* The "Exploratory Journey" gameplay can only be completed in Single-Player Mode, whereas the "Hilinigmatic Duel" gameplay can be done in Co-Op Mode.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain 1.png
|text1  = The Eye of Upano takes the shape of a floating mask and comes from moving components of the Strange Samachurl Statues. It can remotely transmit images of what it is seeing back.<br>The Eye of Upano can bind itself to a targeted {{Color|help|hilichurl or Anemo Slime}} and move along with them while remaining undetected.<br>However, {{Color|help|samachurls}} seem capable of seeing through this disguise...
|image2 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain 2.png
|text2  = The Eye of Upano can affect certain objects from a certain range, such as {{Color|help|Sunsettias, smoke launchers, Hydro Ambers, and bonfires}}.<br>Use this ability well to access the deepest parts of the camp more easily...
|image3 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain 3.png
|text3  = For some unknown reason, all samachurls are capable of detecting the Eye of Upano and chasing it far away. As such, you must {{Color|help|avoid their line of sight}}.<br>Use {{Color|help|smoke launchers}} to block their line of sight.
|image4 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain 4.png
|text4  = Use the Eye of Upano to infiltrate the hilichurl camps and search for the target in the deepest reaches and search for similar {{Color|help|Strange Samachurl Statues}}. You may be able to find key clues this way...
}}

;Sextuple-Sized Sunsettias!
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain Sextuple-Sized Sunsettias 1.png
|text1  = The Mystifying Megachurl will use Sextuple-Sized Sunsettias to attack in battle.<br>However, after you {{Color|help|use Normal Attacks or Charged Attacks to burst these large fruits}}, juice will be left on the ground, and this juice can be used to cause the Mystifying Megachurl to slip and fall...
}}

;Cabbage Attack!
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain Cabbage Attack 1.png
|text1  = The Mystifying Megachurl will summon plummeting Cabbages to strike its foes. However, Normal Attacks or Charged Attacks can be used to {{Color|help|deflect the Cabbages back at it}} and knock it down.
}}

;"Wind, Oh Wind!"
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain Wind Oh Wind 1.png
|text1  = The Mystifying Megachurl has come up with a way to summon the winds and generate large Wind Currents in the Domain.<br>{{Color|help|When it is generating Wind Currents}}, use {{Color|help|shockwaves from Plunging Attacks}} to more easily defeat the Megachurl.
}}
